author: Anonymous Gear
title: Style Guide marks Midterm 2
question: Did we get credit for style guide marks on midterm 2? I seem to remember getting those but my mark on canvas is showing up without them.
instructor_answer: Please review @817 Midterm 2 Grades and Information carefully - Problem 5 was graded twice and appears in Gradescope twice. “MT2 - P5” is the autograding of almost all the problem. For this part you should ignore the gradescope score and focus on the autograder report. “MT2 - P5ta” is the hand grading of the termination argument. For this part you should ignore the autograding report and focus only on the Gradescope rubric.
